result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. David Darnell Nelson

records.addlTxt: Justice Point Pretrial Services DISCHARGE Report received and filed.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. Court takes no action on bail at this time.

Defendant David Darnell Nelson not in court.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case was set for status conference on 07/22/2022 but no court reporter was present due to availability to issue warrant. 
Defendant failing to appear in Court on 07/22/2022, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.

Attorney Joel H. Rosenthal in court.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means.
Case heard off the record due to court reporter availability.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered case adjourned for 07/25/2022 to issue a bench warrant when a court reporter is available. 
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant David Darnell Nelson in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court canceled the stayed bench warrant based on defendant's appearance in court.    Defense counsel to receive discovery and offer and requests additional time to review.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.   All parties are advised effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to a Branch of RESERVE JUDGES.  All parties are advised effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to a Branch of RESERVE JUDGES.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/3c595ccd-39e3-09d4-8db1-82162d766d4f  Status conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant appeared in person after case was already called. Attorney Cullen was outside on Zoom and assisted defendant in getting next court date. Defendant was also provided with a contact number for his attorney.

Attorney Joel H. Rosenthal in court.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM. Case set for pre-trial conference.  No appearance by the defendant. Defense counsel advises the Court he was just appointed and was given no contact information for defendant.
Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed until the next court date.  Case adjourned to Br. 37.  Calendar call scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 5-12-2022, filed.  rmm
Justice Point Pretrial Services Violation Report received and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.

Defendant David Darnell Nelson in court with attorney Jason A Findling.  Defendant David Darnell Nelson in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  David Darnell Nelson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/3c595ccd-39e3-09d4-8db1-82162d766d4f  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
